Module com.javafx.brick_javafx
Package BrickDestroy.Models

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
BrickDestroy.Models.Ball
All Implemented Interfaces:
Mobile
Direct Known Subclasses:
RubberBall
public abstract class Ball extends Object implements Mobile
This class is the Ball model which contains all the data and behaviour of Ball.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball(javafx.geometry.Point2D centerPosition, int radius, javafx.scene.paint.Color innerColor, javafx.scene.paint.Color borderColor)
      This constructor will initialize and define the ball appearance along with the position in the game.
      Parameters:
      centerPosition - The center point of the ball to be spawned in the game in (x,y) coordinates format.
      radius - The radius of the ball created.
      innerColor - The color that defines the ball interior part.
      borderColor - The color that defines the ball exterior part.

  • Method Details

    • makeBall

      protected abstract javafx.scene.shape.Circle makeBall(javafx.geometry.Point2D center, int radius)
      This method will generate the appearance of the ball.
      Parameters:
      center - The center point of the ball to be spawned in the game in (x,y) coordinates format.
      radius - The radius of the ball.
      Returns:
      A circle object to represent the ball appearance.

    • createCircle

      public javafx.scene.shape.Circle createCircle()
      This method will create a circle object that represent the ball appearance.
      Returns:
      A circle that with assigned position.

    • move

      public void move()
      This method handles the ball movement by adding the velocity into the x,y coordinates of the ball.

      public void setSpeed(int speedX, int speedY)
      This method will set the ball velocity in both horizontal and vertical direction.
      Parameters:
      speedX - The horizontal velocity of the ball.
      speedY - The vertical velocity of the ball.
